definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: watch, guard, keep (NH id., observe; As. naṣâru, watch over, protect; OAram. [[נחר]] protect Lzb:325 Cook:83; Palm. in n. pr. Vog:150, 4 Cook:124; Aram. [[נְמַר]], nt.ar (cf. Wetzst in De:Job (2) on Job 27:18); Ar. naz.ara look at, consider, examine (na0t.uwrun, overseer is Aram. loan-word Frä:138); Sab. [[להנחרהמו]] to aid them Hal Rev.Sêm. iv (1896), 71; Eth. nas’ara: spectare, intueri, etc., Di:701;—cf. also [[נטר]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[נְחָרָ֫תַם]] Ps 119:129; 1 S [[נׇחָָרְתִּי]] Ps 119:22, Ps 119:56, Ps 119:100; 3 mpl. [[נׇֽחְרוּ]] Pr 22:12; Impf. [[יִצִּר]] Pr 3:1; sf. [[יִצְּרֶ֫נְהוּ]] Ges:§ 58, 4 R.) De 32:10; f. sf. [[תִּנְחְרֶָכָּה]] Pr 2:11 (Ges:§ 58, 4 R.); 1 S. [[אֶצּׂר]] Ps 119:69; [[אֶצְּרָה]] Ps 119:34, Ps 119:115; [[אֶצָּׂרָה]] Ps 119:145; sf. [[אֶצָּרְְ]] Is 42:6, Is 49:8 (Ges Bö Ew al. from [[יחר]]); [[אֶצֳּרֶָנׇּה]] Is 27:3; 3 mpl. [[יִצְּרוּ]] Pr 20:28; [[יִנְחָׂרוּ]] De 33:9 (on forms v. Ges:§ 66, 2, R. I) + 15 t. Impf.; Imv. [[נְחׂר]] Ps 34:14 + 3 t.; [[נִצְּרָה]] Ps 141:3 (d. f. dirim. Ges:§ 20, 2 b); sf. [[נִצְּרֶָה]] Pr 4:13; Inf. abs. [[נׇחוֹר]] Na 2:2; cstr. [[נְחׂר]] Pr 2:8; Pt. [[נוֹחֵר]] Pr 28:7; [[נׁחֵר]] Ex 34:7 + 7 t.; sf. [[נׁחְרָהּ]] Is 27:3; pl. [[נוֹחְרִים]] 2Ki 17:9, 2Ki 18:8, etc.; pass. [[נׇחוּר]] Ez Eze 6:12; pl. [[נְחוּרִים]] Is 65:4 (LXX e)n toi(v sphlai/oiv, [[בַּמְּערוֹת]]); cstr. [[נְחוּרֵי]] (Kt [[נְחִירֵי]] only here) Is 49:6; f. [[נְחוּרָה]] Is 1:8 (Di rds. [[נְחוֹרָה]] Niph. Pt. √ [[חוּר]]); cstr. [[נְחֻרַת]] Pr 7:10; pl. [[נְחֻרוֹת]] Is 48:6 (Che rds. [[בְּחֻררוֹת]]).

Watch, guard, keep, a vineyard Job 27:18 (cf. Wetzst in De:Job (2) ad loc.), Is 27:3, Is 27:3, fig-tree Pr 27:18, fortification Na 2:2; [[נׁחְרִים]] watchmen Je 31:6; ´[[מִגְדַּל נ]] tower of watchmen 2Ki 17:9, 2Ki 18:8; in ethical sense of men, guarding the mouth Pr 13:3, the way Pr 16:17 [[לֵב]] Pr 4:23; the tongue [[מֵרַע]] Ps 34:14; c. [[על]], over the door of the lips Ps 141:3; of God [[נׁחֵר הָאָדָם]] Job 7:20 (thou) watcher of men (iron.).

Guard from dangers, preserve, c. acc., subj. God or his attributes De 32:10, Ps 25:21, Ps 31:24, Ps 40:12, Ps 61:8, Is 26:3, Is 42:6, Is 49:8, Pr 2:8, Pr 20:28, Pr 22:12; [[נׁחֵר נֶפֶשׁ]] Pr 24:12; c. acc. and [[מן]] from which Ps 12:8, Ps 32:7, Ps 64:2, Ps 140:2, Ps 140:5. In WisdLit. subj. is abstr.: [[חבמה]] Pr 4:6; [[תבונה]] Pr 2:11; [[חדקה]] Pr 13:6; [[נְחוּרֵי ישׂראל]] Is 49:6 preserved of Israel.

Guard with fidelity, keep, observe: of ´[[י]], [[נׁחֵר חֶסֶד לאלפים]] Ex 34:7 (J); elsewhere of man observing the covenant De 33:9 (poem) Ps 25:10, the divine law Ps 78:7, Ps 105:45, Ps 119:2, Ps 119:22, Ps 119:33, Ps 119:34, Ps 119:56, Ps 119:69, Ps 119:100, Ps 119:115, Ps 119:129, Ps 119:145; commands of parents Pr 60:20, Pr 28:7; and discipline of Wisdom Pr 3:1, Pr 3:21, Pr 4:13, Pr 5:2.

Guard, keep secret, dub.: [[נְחֻרוֹת]] secret things Is 48:6; [[נְחוּרִים]] secret places Is 65:4 (see forms above); [[נְחֻרַת לֵב]] secret, wily minded Pr 7:10 (of harlot, so RVm close, i.e. secretive).

Kept close, blockaded, dub.: [[הַנׇּחוּר]] the blockaded (so Ew Hi Co Toy; but Ke Bth Kau preserved; Hi Co Bth Toy del. [[והנשׁאר]]) Ez Eze 6:12; [[עִיר נְחוּרָה]] blockaded city Is 1:8 (see form above); [[נׁחְרִים]] blockaders Je 4:16 (but LXX sustrofai = [[חררים]] i.e. foes).
